   "source": [
    "# import libraries we need\n",
    "import numpy\n",
    "import pylab"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# define the simple power law function\n",
    "def simple_pl(F0,E0,alpha,E):\n",
    "    return F0*(E/E0)**(-alpha)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "5.65685424949e-12\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# try out the simple power law:\n",
    "print(simple_pl(1.0e-12,1.0,2.5,0.5))"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "# set up a range of energies from 0.1 TeV to 100 TeV\n",
    "#  - make sure that the energies are uniformly spaced in log space\n",
    "estart = 0.1\n",
    "estop = 100\n",
    "enumber = 100\n",
    "energies = numpy.logspace(numpy.log10(estart),numpy.log10(estop),enumber)\n",
    "print(energies)"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "# use a list comprehension to do the following:\n",
    "#  - for each energy, compute the simple power law spectrum with:\n",
    "#    - F0 = 1.0e-12 (TeV cm^2 s)^(-1)\n",
    "#    - E0 = 1 TeV\n",
    "#    - alpha = 2.5\n",
    "#  - then, weight by the square of the energy\n",
    "fluxes = [e*e*simple_pl(1.0e-12,1.0,i,e) for e in energies]\n",
    "print(fluxes)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,

   ],
   "source": [
    "# plot the spectrum with nice axis labels\n",
    "pylab.plot(energies,fluxes,color = \"red\",linewidth = 2,marker = \"\")\n",
    "pylab.xlabel(r\"Energy [TeV]\",fontsize = 18)\n",
    "pylab.ylabel(r\"$E^{2}dN/dE$ Flux [TeV cm$^{-2}$ s$^{-1}$]\",fontsize = 18)\n",
    "pylab.show()"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "# Make the same plot but on a log-log scale\n",
    "pylab.plot(energies,fluxes,color = \"red\",linewidth = 2,marker = \"\")\n",
    "pylab.xlabel(r\"Energy [TeV]\",fontsize = 18)\n",
    "pylab.ylabel(r\"$E^{2}dN/dE$ Flux [TeV cm$^{-2}$ s$^{-1}$]\",fontsize = 18)\n",
    "pylab.yscale(\"log\")\n",
    "pylab.xscale(\"log\")\n",
    "pylab.show()"
   ]

   "source": [
    "# Make a plot comparing a spectrum with index of 3 and coefficient of 2.0e-12\n",
    "fluxes2 = [e*e*simple_pl(2.0e-12,1.0,3.0,e) for e in energies]\n",
    "pylab.plot(energies,fluxes,color = \"red\",linewidth = 2,marker = \"\")\n",
    "pylab.plot(energies,fluxes2,color = \"black\",linewidth = 2,marker = \"\")\n",
    "pylab.xlabel(r\"Energy [TeV]\",fontsize = 18)\n",
    "pylab.ylabel(r\"$E^{2}dNdE$ Flux [TeV cm$^{-2}$ s$^{-1}$]\",fontsize = 18)\n",
    "pylab.yscale(\"log\")\n",
    "pylab.xscale(\"log\")\n",
    "pylab.show()"
